Text: I don't get it...what's not working? i.e. What issue are you having? As you know, I up there and can help...I think.

perhaps i will just email you the torrent file and you can upload it for me on there if tpb is down?

BTW...TPB is possessed! I keep hearing (randomly) TV audio coming from my browser.
Before I was hearing clips from some HBO ad. Now I just heard some audio from American Idol!

The only way to stop it, is to close my browser or refresh the page, and hope it doesn't start again.

Yeah....you need to be be a "verified uploader" otherwise it puts a hold on it. When you go to upload, there should be a check box to request becoming verified. Also, until you become verified, there is one of those stupid graphic number/letter things you need to type in, or it won't let you up.
Is the "image verification" thingy showing up? If not, it might be your browser.
i have asked to be verified numerous times but no luck...

Hmmm.....looks like something is amiss at torrentzap judging by what is posted in the "community" section.
I also upload at kickasstorrents, you should give it a try. Very active community there.
